author: anon9339
body:
Something I know about!!!  I work in roads/bridge construction doing estimating aka procurement, some of my guesses:

Design + EPCM: GVA, FLR, J, ACM

Software/hardware: TRMB, ADSK

Materials: NUE, GGB, CMC (pretty risky though, steel mills all around the Midwest have been shut down temporarily, scaled back, or permanently)

Tons of other companies but they aren't NYSE/NASDAQ (e.g.  CRHCF,  GELYF (Volvo makes 10/10 equipment), WSP).
